snippet.title: A Day Without Me - Trailer
snippet.description:
A Day Without Me is a puzzle adventure game, where you have to find out where everyone is going, why is there only you in the city, why are there so many oddities in the city

You just woke up and without knowing it, you were the only person left in the city

Release on Steam, August 3 2020

Featuring:
-Plot mysterious story
-Semi open world
-Lots of challenges and mysteries to solve

Follow our social media to stay update
-Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GamecomTeam
-Twitter: https://twitter.com/GamecomTeam
-Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gamecomteam

Our support email at:
official@gamecomteam.com

Our official website:
https://gamecomteam.com
